metadata.title: CVE-2024-0746 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
A Linux user opening the print preview dialog could have caused the browserto crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 122, Firefox ESR < 115.7,and Thunderbird < 115.7.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-0746` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 122.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 122.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 122.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '122.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
